sections.name: Vice-Chancellor Vikroti Stroh
sections.html: This creature did not include a description.

traits.name: Unique
traits.text: A rules element with this trait is one-of-a-kind. The DC of Recall Knowledge checks related to creatures with this trait is increased by 10.

traits.name: Lawful
traits.text: Lawful effects often manipulate energy from law-aligned Outer Planes and are antithetical to chaotic divine servants or divine servants of chaotic deities. A creature with this trait is lawful in alignment.

traits.name: Evil
traits.text: Evil effects often manipulate energy from evil-aligned Outer Planes and are antithetical to good divine servants or divine servants of good deities. A creature with this trait is evil in alignment.

traits.name: Undead
traits.text: Once living, these creatures were infused after death with negative energy and soul-corrupting evil magic. When reduced to 0 Hit Points, an undead creature is destroyed. Undead creatures are damaged by positive energy, are healed by negative energy, and don't benefit from healing effects.

automatic_abilities.name: Rejuvenation

traits.name: Arcane
traits.text: This magic comes from the arcane tradition, which is built on logic and rationality. Anything with this trait is magical.

traits.name: Necromancy
traits.text: Effects and magic items with this trait are associated with the necromancy school of magic, typically involving forces of life and death.

automatic_abilities.text: When Vikroti is destroyed, her soul immediately transfers to her soul cage. She can be permanently destroyed only if her soul cage is found and destroyed.

automatic_abilities.name: Death's Chill

traits.name: Aura
traits.text: An aura is an emanation that continually ebbs out from you, affecting creatures within a certain radius. Aura can also refer to the magical signature of an item or a creature with a strong alignment.

traits.name: Cold
traits.text: Effects with this trait deal cold damage. Creatures with this trait have a connection to magical cold.

traits.name: Evocation
traits.text: Effects and magic items with this trait are associated with the evocation school of magic, typically involving energy and elemental forces.

automatic_abilities.text: 15 feet. Vikroti is surrounded by an unnatural chill. Creatures that enter or begin their turn within the aura take 5d10 cold damage and are clumsy 2 (DC 37 basic Fortitude save).

automatic_abilities.name: Counterspell
automatic_abilities.trigger: A creature casts a spell Vikroti has prepared
automatic_abilities.effect: Vikroti expends a prepared spell to counter the triggering creature's casting of that same spell. She loses her spell slot as if she'd cast the triggering spell. Vikroti then attempts to counteract the triggering spell.

traits.name: Finesse
traits.text: You can use your Dexterity modifier instead of your Strength modifier on attack rolls using this melee weapon. You still use your Strength modifier when calculating damage.

traits.name: Magical
traits.text:
Something with the magical trait is imbued with magical energies not tied to a specific tradition of magic. A magical item radiates a magic aura infused with its dominant school of magic.  
  
 Some items or effects are closely tied to a particular tradition of magic. In these cases, the item has the arcane, divine, occult, or primal trait instead of the magical trait. Any of these traits indicate that the item is magical.

ability.name: Cold Beyond Cold
ability.text: Vikroti's hand Strike deals cold damage, and the target is slowed 2. A successful DC 44 Fortitude save reduces this to slowed 1 (or negates on a critical success).

ability.name: Drain Soul Cage
ability.effect: Vikroti taps into her soul cage's power to cast any arcane spell up to the highest level she can cast, even if the spell being cast isn't one of her prepared spells. Her soul cage doesn't need to be present for her to use this ability.

ability.name: Steady Spellcasting
ability.text: If a reaction would disrupt Vikroti's spellcasting action, Vikroti attempts a DC 15 flat check. On a success, the action isn't disrupted.
